commits.author: tmjbios
commits.before: Optional assumed-length character dummy arguments caused null pointer crashes during code generation.
commits.added: Added `isa_and_nonnull` null check for size values lacking defining operations in allocation lowering.
commits.impact: Enables crash-free compilation of Fortran with optional assumed-length character dummy arguments.
commits.message: [flang] OPTIONAL char dummy has no defining op; add null check (#182582)
